description: The product associated with the account

product_id.description: The Canopy-generated ID for the product.

name.description: Name of Product, i.e. Express Card.

product_color.description: A color to be associated with the product for UI purposes.

short_description.description: Short description of the Product - max of 30 characters.

type.description: The type of product the account is on

purchase_window_duration.description: If applicable, the number of cycles during which this product runs a purchase window

promo_period_duration.description: The number of cycles during which this product falls under a promotional window

amortization_period_length.description: The number of cycles during which this product falls under an amortization period

payoff_date.description: The `Date-Time` at which the account is scheduled to finish being paid off.
